markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Agile Maneuvers](/Feats.aspx?ID=1533) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Your easily maneuver against your foes. Your [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) actions have a lower multiple attack penalty: –4 instead of –5 if they're the second attack on your turn, or –8 instead of –10 if they're the third or subsequent attack on your turn.
name: Agile Maneuvers
